ygData.subject: Re: a little info please
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, here s the address for The Bard s Guide: http://bardsguide.dhs.org/ Problem is, he quit maintaining it on the 6th of June. So, I d like to recommend
ygData.messageBody:
Well, here's the address for The Bard's Guide:

http://bardsguide.dhs.org/

Problem is, he quit maintaining it on the 6th of June.

So, I'd like to recommend Willowin's site, The Concert Hall,
as he is doing a fantastic job with his website. Kudo's to Willowin!
Here's the link:

http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/

MacGrough
14th Level Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers
